QuestData.Title: Bone Tools
QuestData.Description:
So the device we need to open this vault is stuck on a floating island, eh?
Not a problem.
I see plenty of sturdy creatures around here. Like I always say, no bone goes to waste!
Bring me a pile of their bones. I'll use them to craft hookshot points for us to use to grapple over there.
QuestData.RewardText: Yes, this will do. Think I'll save one to show the other smiths back home.
